titleStmt.title: Chronostichon decollationis Caroli regis, &c. tricesimo die Januarii, secunda hora Pomeridiana, anno Dom. MDCXLVIII. Ter Deno IanI Labens ReX SoLe CaDente CaroLVs eXVtVs SoLIo SCeptroqVe SeCVre.
titleStmt.author: Fisher, Payne, 1616-1693.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Payne Fisher by Wing.
Verse - "Charles! - ah forbeare, forbeare! let Mortals prize".
Reproductions of the originals in the Huntington Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
